Room.Name: Lelion Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Lelion Way, which runs east and west through town.
Room.LongDescription: Lelion is a long road, spanning from the eastern city walls to the east, all the way to the Nylandian Bay, many miles to the west. On the north side of the road is the Temple of Harmonic Discord, one of the most powerful clerical temples in Oceancrest.
